mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_DAYPLANID as "${columnPrefix}dayPlanId", ${tableAlias}S_CHECKLISTSUMMARYID as "${columnPrefix}checklistSummaryId", ${tableAlias}S_DETAILID as "${columnPrefix}detailId", ${tableAlias}S_TRAINSETID as "${columnPrefix}trainsetId", ${tableAlias}S_FAULTID as "${columnPrefix}faultId", ${tableAlias}D_CREATETIME as "${columnPrefix}createTime", ${tableAlias}S_STUFFID as "${columnPrefix}stuffId"
